settings.title: FriendsOfFlarum Stop Forum Spam
settings.frequency_text: The number of spam reports between all enabled checks that will trip the spam filter.
settings.frequency_example_text: Ex: If the email has 1 hit, and the ip has 2 hits, there will be 3 hits in total. If the threshold is set to 3 or less it will prevent the registration.
settings.api_key_text: You have fof/spamblock enabled, you now have the option to report spammers to StopForumSpam in order to keep the greater forum community spam free.
settings.api_key_instructions_text: <register>Sign up for StopForumSpam</register>. Then you will need to <key>obtain an API key</key>.

message.spam: Your info has been marked as spam.

error.unknown: Failed to report user to StopForumSpam.
